description: Proton flux of energetic particles (>100 MeV) measured by each CHU (Camera Head Unit)
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,UTC,Time of observation,1,CDF_EPOCH
SyncStatus,-,"Time synchronization status (of VFM), source and quality",1,CDF_UINT16
Latitude ,deg,Position in ITRF – Geocentric latitude ,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude ,deg,Position in ITRF – Geocentric longitude ,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,Position in ITRF – Radius,1,CDF_DOUBLE
EPF,cm-2s-1,"Energetic particle flux, NaN if Flags_EPF >= 16",3,CDF_DOUBLE
EPD,-,Energetic particle detections,3,CDF_UINT2
T_CHU,℃,CHU temperature,3,CDF_DOUBLE
RA,deg,Rect-ascension of CHU attitude,3,CDF_DOUBLE
DEC,deg,Declination of CHU attitude,3,CDF_DOUBLE
EPD_T_corr,-,Temperature correction of particle count,3,CDF_DOUBLE
EPD_Dens_corr,-,Star density correction of particle count,3,CDF_DOUBLE
Flags_EPF,-,Flags characterizing the energetic particle flux estimate (EPF),3,CDF_UINT1
related_resources: • Toldbo, C., Sushkova, J., Herceg, M. et al. Mapping High Energy Particles Using Augmented Star Trackers On-Board Swarm. Space Sci Rev 218, 58 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-022-00925-z
details:
Flag Value Description Dim Type
Flags_EPF 0 Energetic particle flux estimate nominal 1 CDF_EPOCH
1 Star density above limit in field of view 1 CDF_UINT16
2 CHU temperature above limit 1 CDF_DOUBLE
4 Gain control not stabilized 1 CDF_DOUBLE
8 Raw particle count above limit 1 CDF_DOUBLE
16 Big bright object (BBO) detected 3 CDF_DOUBLE
32 CHU in high-rate mode (image smir) 3 CDF_UINT2
64 Non-valid attitude sample 3 CDF_DOUBLE
128 On-board processing not completed 3 CDF_DOUBLE
>128 Any combination of the above 3 CDF_DOUBLE
